## Project Snapshot

- Project: nocdn/ui
- Purpose: Small, reusable shadcn-style UI components with practical docs.
- Stack: Next.js App Router, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS.
- Distribution: shadcn registry JSON endpoints under `/r`.
- Main docs entry: `/introduction`
- Root path behavior: `/` redirects to `/introduction`.

## Documentation Content

### Introduction (`/introduction`)

The introduction explains that nocdn/ui focuses on simple but uncommon components that are not usually included in mainstream UI kits. It invites users to browse components, use them in their own projects, and contribute improvements.

### Installation (`/installation`)

The installation guide explains that components are distributed through a shadcn registry and that shadcn should be configured first.

Primary install pattern:

`bunx --bun shadcn@latest add https://ui.bartoszbak.org/r/cornered-button.json`

The page links users to the cornered button docs after installation.

### Compatibility (`/compatibility`)

Published compatibility targets:

- React 19+
- TypeScript 5.3+
- Tailwind CSS 4.x

Additional notes:

- Code assumes an `@ -> src` alias.
- Motion can run server-side, but initial mount animation flash may require hydration gating or disabled initial animations.
- Troubleshooting covers alias resolution and missing type setup.

### Cornered Button (`/components/cornered-button`)

Summary:

- Button component with border and configurable corner accents.
- Designed to follow shadcn conventions and accessibility expectations.

Install command:

`bunx --bun shadcn@latest add https://ui.bartoszbak.org/r/cornered-button.json`

Usage import:

`import { CorneredButton } from '@/components/ui/cornered-button'`

API surface documented on the page:

- `size?: "sm" | "md" | "lg"`
- `variant?: "default" | "outline" | "ghost" | "destructive"`
- `corners?: "on" | "off"`
- `borderWidth?: number`
- `cornerSize?: number`
- `cornerColor?: string`
- `type?: "button" | "submit" | "reset"`
- `className?: string`
- `style?: React.CSSProperties`
- `ref?: React.Ref<HTMLButtonElement>`
- `children?: React.ReactNode`

### Animated Ticker (`/components/ticker`)

Summary:

- Animated status ticker for changing text values.

Install command:

`bunx --bun shadcn@latest add https://ui.bartoszbak.org/r/ticker.json`

Usage import:

`import { Ticker } from '@/components/ui/ticker'`

Documented props:

- `className?: string`
- `text: string`

### Animated Button (`/components/animated-button`)

Summary:

- Uses `AnimatedButton` to transition between primary and secondary visual states.
- Intended for actions such as copy and quick status confirmation.

Install command:

`bunx --bun shadcn@latest add https://ui.bartoszbak.org/r/animated-button.json`

Usage import:

`import { AnimatedButton } from '@/components/ui/animated-button'`

Documented props:

- `className?: string`
- `children: React.ReactNode`
- `secondaryChildren?: React.ReactNode`
- `onClick?: () => void`
- `ariaLabel: string`
- `showingSecondary?: boolean`
- `timeout?: number`
